summary: The diff adds an offline journal portal mini-app, but it is created under `frontend/project/` rather than the requested repo-root `/project/` path. Several unrelated modifications to the existing React app are also present, which conflicts with the request to keep the production app unchanged.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create the offline-ready mini-app under `/project` at the repo root with `/project/index.html`, `/project/dashboard.html`, `/project/admin.html`, and subfolders `/project/css`, `/project/js`, `/project/assets`, `/project/receipts`.
missing_requirements.reason: All added files appear under `frontend/project/...` rather than `/project/...` at the repository root.

missing_requirements.requirement: 'Download Receipt' action downloads/opens a local mock PDF from `/project/receipts` using a relative path.
missing_requirements.reason: The DB seed references `./receipts/mock-receipt.pdf`, but the diff only shows `frontend/project/receipts/.gitkeep` and does not show an actual PDF file being added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Submission table provides a working local download link for the referenced submitted file (use `/project/assets` as needed).
missing_requirements.reason: The DB seed references `./assets/sample-submission.pdf`, but the diff only shows `frontend/project/assets/.gitkeep` and does not show the referenced sample submission file being added.

missing_requirements.requirement: README includes the final folder tree for `/project`.
missing_requirements.reason: The README's 'Folder Structure' section is present but the diff content is truncated right after the opening code block, so the required folder tree is not evidenced.

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple changes to the existing React/TanStack Router production app (routes, header/footer, Stripe dialogs, admin panel page behavior, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly scopes work to the standalone offline mini-app under `/project` and says to keep the Internet Computer React+Motoko production app unchanged unless strictly necessary; these React app changes are unrelated to the offline mini-app implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `project_state.json` description/summary and existing feature catalog entries.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request modifications to project metadata/state tracking; it focuses on implementing the offline mini-app under `/project`.
